item.title: Notes on Effective Programming Practice
item.description: Slides Example Process of Setting Up A Project Shell Reference Basics Pipeline Git Reference Basics Escape Vim Late .gitignore Multiple Branches Tagging (Ana)Conda Reference Setup for Zsh Create & Delete Environment Kernels Use Sublime with SendCode Python Waf Config Slides Effective programming practices for economists: Slides — Hans-Martin von Gaudecker Templates for Reproducible Research Projects in Economics — Tutorial: Templates for reproducible research projects Dropbox - prog-econ-log Example Process of Setting Up A Project # creat an environment from an environment.

item.title: Introduction to Python 3
item.description: Slides Basics Notes from Effective Programming Reference Simple Examples List & Loop Dictionary Conditionals Lab Slides ch1 ch2 ch3 ch4 Basics print("Hello world") 1 + 2 # Out[1]: 3 print( 1 + 2 ) # 3 print( 2 - 1 ) # 1 print( 2 * 3 ) # 6 print( 4 / 2 ) # 2.0 print( 7 % 3 ) # 1 print( 4 ** 2 ) # 16 'ab' + 'cd' # 'abcd' height = 1.
